title: Dwayne 'The Rock' Johnson teases UFC announcement ahead of appearance
text:
Johnson will present the Masvidal vs Diaz winner with the BMF title (Picture: Getty)

Dwayne ‘The Rock’ Johnson has revealed he will make a ‘special’ announcement for MMA fans at UFC 244’s press conference on Friday.

The ‘Baddest Motherf******’ belt is set to be unveiled at Friday’s media event and the Rock confirmed in an Instagram live session that he will attend.

The actor and former WWE star also said he would present the winner of Jorge Masvidal vs Nate Diaz with the BMF belt in the cage after their showdown.

‘This addition to the company and the brand and to the sport, this BMF belt, I think it’s brilliant,’ Johnson said. ‘It’s so smart and it’s just fun, man.’

Masvidal and Diaz headline UFC 244 and will fight for the BMF title (Picture: Getty)

Johnson teased there would be another surprise announced on Friday, saying there was ‘something I wanted to tell the UFC fans and MMA community first.’

The UFC and WWE have a history of stars crossing between their promotions, with Brock Lesnar a heavyweight champion in the octagon and a star performer in wrestling.

Ronda Rousey was also a champion in both UFC and the WWE, while Cain Velasquez is the latest former UFC superstar to cross over.

The UFC will formally announce their fight card for UFC 245, their final pay-per-view event of the year on 14 December in Las Vegas.

Asked what his prediction for the main event, Johnson insisted he wouldn’t pick a winner.

He said: ‘I learned a long time ago in terms of combat sports, in boxing and in MMA, especially at this level with two guys who are so skilled and respected in Masvidal and Diaz, that I just want a good fight.

The Rock will be cageside for UFC 244 (Picture: Getty)

‘Everyone’s got a puncher’s chance. I’m such a fan of MMA that I have too much respect for the guys and girls who put it all on the line to say who’s going to win.

‘I just want to see a great fight, the addition of the BMF belt is brilliant, it’s so smart and it’s fun; it’s fun for the fighters, it gives them some juice to go out there and Madison Square Garden is the perfect place for this fight; that place is going to be rocking and I can’t wait to get in there.

‘Both of these guys have been around the game for a long time… with Diaz, you’re not going to knock him out and you’re not going to submit him – he’d rather die before he submits.

‘And Masvidal’s legend is legit, that is a bad dude coming out of south Florida.’

description: Dwayne 'The Rock' Johnson revealed he has something special to tell MMA fans at a Friday press conference ahead of UFC 244.
